paragraphs.pedo: I notice that you have used the word Pedo/Pedophile in your message. This is hate speech, and against the rules. In the future, make sure to use a more neutral term, such as 'MAP'.
paragraphs.nigger: Uh-oh! You just did a racism by posting a racial slur (the n-word). I will forgive you this time, but the next time I might not be so lenient.
